text: int main ( ) { int t , n , i , x = 0 , j = 1 , sum , a [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { for ( j ; j <= i + x ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ j ] ) ; } x += i ; } j = 1 ; sum = a [ j ] ; i = 1 ; while ( i <= n + 1 ) { sum += ( a [ j + i ] > a [ j + i + 1 ] ) ? a [ j + i ] : a [ j + i + 1 ] ; i ++ ; } printf ( "%d" , sum ) ; } }
